task.title: How to Return an Item on Amzon

taskbody.context: Learn how to return an item purchased on Amazon using the website or mobile app.

step.cmd: Go to the Amazon website (www.amazon.com) or open the Amazon mobile app.
step.info: Log in to your Amazon account if you are not already signed in.

info.p: On the website, click Returns & Orders at the top right. In the app, tap the menu icon and select Your Orders.

step.cmd: Locate the item you want to return and click Return or Replace Items.

info.p: If the option is unavailable, check the return eligibility period for the item.

step.cmd: Select the reason for the return from the dropdown menu.

info.p: Choose the reason that best describes your situation, such as "Defective item" or "Wrong item sent."
You can opt for a refund, replacement, or repair, depending on the item and return policy.

step.cmd: Choose how you will return the item.

info.p: Select a return method, such as dropping it off at an authorized location or scheduling a pickup.

step.cmd: Print the return label and packing slip if required.
step.info: Follow the instructions provided by Amazon for packaging and labeling the item.

step.cmd: Package the item securely and attach the return label.
step.info: Ensure the item is packed according to Amazon's return instructions to avoid damage during transit.

step.cmd: Drop off the package at the selected location or have it picked up as scheduled.
step.info: Retain the return receipt or tracking number for reference.

step.cmd: Monitor your return status in Your Orders.
step.info: Amazon will update you on the status of your return and refund or replacement.
